items.title: Learning
items.description: I think learning is a difficult topic as it is extremely individual and is also one of the most important skills to have. Moreover, learning is a process as well, and in order to become a skilled learner you need to not only try different methods but also be able to evaluate yourself in a good and non-discriminate way.

items.title: Letters to a Young Contrarian
items.description: This book is about being right, not being in the crowd etc. It is advice on how to stay true to the principles. The letters are thoughtful and engaging.

items.title: Writing
items.description: Writing is hard.  It takes time, effort and experience. It is something that takes effort to even start.
